verses.roman:
aṣṭama ślokera kaila saṅkṣepe vivaraṇa
navama ślokera artha śuna diyā mana

synonyms: aṣṭama—eighth; ślokera—of the verse; kaila—I have done; saṅkṣepe—in brief; vivaraṇa—description; navama—the ninth; ślokera—of the verse; artha—the meaning; śuna—please hear; diyā mana—with mental attention.
translation: I have briefly explained the eighth verse. Now please listen with attention as I explain the ninth verse.
